title: Roche - Doing now what patients need next
description: As a pioneer in healthcare, we have been committed to improving lives since the company was founded in 1896 in Basel, Switzerland. Today, Roche creates innovative medicines and diagnostic tests that help millions of patients globally.
cleaned_text: Roche has established a multi-lingual global hotline (tel: +36 146 182 58; WhatsApp +36 707 177 394) and an email address (patientcare@roche.com) for patients and healthcare providers in or from Ukraine. We will do our best to provide everyone who is in need with the appropriate information and support.
